text.b: Data analysis project with R: "Smartphone purchase behavior of students

page.text: Qualitative research: Combining theoretical background, previous research models
with group discussion techniques (group discussion with 3 groups of students from
different schools). From this result, build a formal questionnaire.

data processing and test model (EFA, Scale Reliability, CFA, SEM , Bootstrap, multi-
group). With the support of packages on software R.
